text: elem tera ile-llezine kile lehum kuffu eydiyekum veekimu-ssalate veatu-zzekah. felemma kutibe `aleyhimu-lkitalu iza ferikum minhum yahsevne-nnase kehasyeti-llahi ev esedde hasyeh. vekalu rabbena lime ketebte `aleyne-lkital. levla ehhartena ila ecelin karib. kul meta`u-ddunya kalil. vel'ahiratu hayrul limeni-tteka vela tuzlemune fetila
